Class StatusBar

java.lang.Object

                          +--edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.StatusBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class StatusBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Representation of a generic status bar for an application. This is a static class. In this case it provides the ability to call the methods from any where in the application. For example, StatusBar.setCenterStatus(...);

See Also:
Serialized Form
